Class Breakout

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Panel
          • java.applet.Applet
            • javax.swing.JApplet
              • main.Breakout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer

    public class Breakout
extends javax.swing.JApplet
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The main class of the game and the program's entry point. Is a JApplet.
    Author:
    Erik
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
